text: Why thank you. Your work looks awesome by the way!
You can seek a refund through TF if it is not as advertised - but it is :)
Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world
Comfortable shoes and the freedom to leave are the two most important things in life.
The shoes and the eyes are windows to a woman's spirit
Shoes make an outfit. You can throw on a crazy shirt and crazy pants but you add those shoes - done
Every song, every form of art, clothing, shoes, it has to be special
Be well dressed, behave like a gentleman, and keep your shoes shined
You can wear anything as long as you put a nice pair of shoes with it
Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations
Don't reject a shoe because you can't run in it. It's OK not to run
If the shoe fits, it is probably worn out
Good ideas are like Nike sports shoes. Sports shoes don't win races. Athletes do
